Patient 17: A 40-year-old male with a history of schizophrenia, managed with olanzapine. He also has a history of hypertension, for which he takes amlodipine. His medication list includes a recent addition of metformin due to weight gain associated with olanzapine. There is no documented family history of psychiatric disorders. He has no known drug allergies, but his medication adherence has been inconsistent in the past.
